comment: Smart Data Models - ExcST1A adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcST1A/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modification of an old IEEE ST1A static excitation system without overexcitation limiter (OEL) and underexcitation limiter (UEL).

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: ilr
contents.comment: Exciter output current limit reference (Ilr).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Voltage regulator gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 190. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (Kc). Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gains (Kf).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: klr
contents.comment: Exciter output current limiter gain (Klr).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: tb
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: tb1
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tb).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tc
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: tc1
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (Tc).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (Tf).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (Vamax).  Typical Value = 999. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (Vamin).  Typical Value = -999. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator input limit (Vimax).  Typical Value = 999. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vimin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator input limit (Vimin).  Typical Value = -999. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmax).  Typical Value = 7.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator outputs (Vrmin).  Typical Value = -6.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xe
contents.comment: Excitation xfmr effective reactance (Xe).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
